message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is truly one of a kind and has the potential to be incredibly valuable. While I can't disclose the exact details, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1800000, giving you a chance to acquire it at a potentially significant discount. Consider this a chance to get in on something truly special.  Let me know if you're interested.
